results.title: The Most beautiful place on earth: international zone
results.creator_credit: United Nations Television, Pierre des Bonnet and Martin Bunnel
results.brief_description: Shows the scientific research undertaken on Antarctica, which has been declared open for use by all mankind for scientific and peaceful purposes. This film shows the international co-operation achieved in efforts to preserve the unique environment of the continent.

results.title: The Most
results.creator_credit: Inter Video, Richard Ballentine and Gordon Sheppard
results.brief_description: A study of Hugh Hefner, creator of the fantastically successful Playboy magazine and the Bunny Clubs. He is shown with his staff in his office, at a party in his own home, talking about his ideas and beliefs, and working alone at night in the deserted office building. Music by Dudley Moore. “The Playboy Twist” sung by Tommy Danton.

results.title: The Mosquito coast
results.creator_credit: Saul Zaentz, Jerome Hellman and Peter Weir
results.brief_description: Based on the novel of the same name by Paul Theroux and adapted for the screen by Paul Schrader, the film tells the story of an eccentric inventor who, sick of seeing the world deteriorate around him, takes his family from their Massachusetts farm to the dark jungles of Honduras to start a fresh new life. However all does not run smoothly in their new jungle paradise and it is not the utopia of his dreams. Stars Harrison Ford, River Phoenix, Helen Mirren and Martha Plimpton.

results.title: The Mosquito
results.brief_description: The lifecycle of the mosquito, its breeding places, eggs, larvae, pupa, and the final stage. Methods used to combat the spread of mosquitoes are shown in detail.

results.title: The Moselle: a victory for Europe
results.brief_description: On May 24, 1964, the new waterway on the river Moselle, an important step towards European economic unity, was inaugurated. It connects the iron ore deposits of the Lorraine and the Saar, and the Ruhr Valley with the Belgian-Dutch coalmines. Shows the picturesque landscape of the Moselle area.
results.description: On May 24, 1964, the new waterway on the river Moselle, an important step towards European economic unity, was inaugurated. results.title: The Morning star painter
results.creator_credit: Curtis Levy Productions, Australia Council and Curtis Levy
results.brief_description: A film about an Aboriginal family who live in Arnhem Land in the Northern Territory. Jack Wunuwun is a tribal elder and a well known painter and this film records him making a bark painting depicting the legend of the morning star. Bark paintings and woven baskets, that are done by the family, are taken into Darwin to be sold. Narrated and with music by David Gulpilil.

results.title: The Morning spider (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Black & White Colour Film Company, Mark O'Connor and Claude Chagrin
results.brief_description: Presents, without narration, a humorous children’s tale in mime, which depicts the life of a hard-working, but often inept morning spider. Cast: Julian Chagrin.

results.title: The Morning miracle
results.brief_description: The story behind the morning delivery of milk to some 2 million homes. The milk is transported in bulk from the farms to the depot where the process of pasteurisation and bottling takes place. Tests for fat content and purity are constant through every stage. The nation’s health and security are greatly dependent on a reliable supply of fresh pure milk.

results.title: The Morning after = That extra effort
results.brief_description: A sales executive very much suffering from a hang-over attends a Marketing Meeting. The presentation announces high sales expectations for the coming period. The hung-over executive responds in various ways throughout the meeting.

results.title: The Morgan experience
results.creator_credit: PP Video Productions, Castrol and Lindsay Porter
results.brief_description: Brian Weeks has been driving and filming Morgans for over 25 years. This video is the result of this experience and covers a broad range of areas such as; footage from Morgans in action at Le Mans, the evolution and construction of the vehicles, associated motor clubs, buying, maintaining and restoring, 3 wheeler Morgans, Morgans in the United States, interviews with Peter and Charles Morgan, plus much more.
